column4: hey, I upgraded my kernel and I get a vfs unable to mount root fs on unknown-block(0,0)
I booted from a CD, ran chroot
and installed the old kernel that worked from apt repo
dapper is very broken right now
new kernel needs a new userland, old kernel doesn't work well with new userland
but it sounds like your partition got trashed
its not, I mounted ir from another hd
I think I Just need to get my initrd back or something
that looks like a grub error
will a reinstall of grub get me running?
how can I tell grub to reinstate everything
do u know how to stop messages from going to the console?
this old sata_nv driver streams this annoying stuff non stop
